Class Matrix4x4

public class Matrix4x4
extends ValueType
The base .NET class managing System.Numerics.Matrix4x4, System.Private.CoreLib, Version=5.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e. Extends NetObject.

See: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/System.Numerics.Matrix4x4
